title: An Act designating the Chelsea District Courthouse as The Kevin G. Murphy Judicial Center

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Turco of Winthrop, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 2014) of Jeffrey Rosario Turco for legislation to designate the Chelsea District Courthouse as The Kevin G. Murphy Judicial Center.  The Judiciary.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on The Judiciary
Hearing scheduled for 11/04/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-1
